name: 4th International Meeting on Breast Cancer & Therapies
content: Meetings International invites participants from around the globe to attend the "4th International Meeting on Breast Cancer & Therapies," scheduled for March 17-18, 2025, in Singapore. This event will feature keynote presentations, oral talks, poster presentations, and exhibitions. This year's theme, "Empowering Survivors: Advances in Breast Cancer Therapies," promises a compelling scientific program with renowned and thought-provoking speakers. Breast cancer involves the abnormal growth of cells in the breast lobules or ducts, which can grow uncontrollably and potentially spread to other parts of the body. While it is uncommon in men, both men and women can develop breast cancer.
